channel.title: Comments on: WRITE UP – FACEBOOK N/A REPORT WRITE UP: File Disclosure via .DS_Store file (macOS)

item.title: By: feat
item.dc:creator: feat
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/write-up-file-disclosure-via-ds_store-file-macos/#comment-2">david</a>.

item.title: By: Youssef A. Mohamed
item.dc:creator: Youssef A. Mohamed
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/write-up-file-disclosure-via-ds_store-file-macos/#comment-2">david</a>.
It is probably caused by a mix of tabs and spaces.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to david.

It is probably caused by a mix of tabs and spaces.

item.title: By: omespino
item.dc:creator: omespino
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/write-up-file-disclosure-via-ds_store-file-macos/#comment-2">david</a>.
Hey , you need to install the import packages with pip , per example "pip install DSStore" and "pip install tqmd", thats why is being failing
item.content:encoded:
In reply to david.

Hey , you need to install the import packages with pip , per example “pip install DSStore” and “pip install tqmd”, thats why is being failing

item.title: By: david
item.dc:creator: david
item.description:
Hi, Perfect Article, i tried this python script and i am getting this error : File "ds.py", line 15 data = str(data) ^
Can you please help?
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Perfect Article, i tried this python script and i am getting this error :
File “ds.py”, line 15
data = str(data)
^

Can you please help?
